name: fyp-guidance-system
description: Final Year Project Research and Guidance System

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev" "npm run backend:express" "npm run backend:flask"
scripts.backend:flask: cd backend_flask && C:/Python313/python.exe -m flask --app wsgi run --debug
scripts.start:all: concurrently --names "Frontend,Express,Flask" --prefix-colors "cyan,yellow,magenta" "npm run dev" "npm run backend:express" "npm run backend:flask"
